scripts.schema:validate: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma validate --schema .work/prisma/schema && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.schema:format: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma format --schema .work/prisma/schema && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma migrate dev --schema .work/prisma/schema && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.migrate:deploy: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma migrate deploy --schema .work/prisma/schema && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.diff:from-db: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh sh -lc 'prisma migrate diff --from-url "$POSTGRES_URL" --to-schema-datamodel .work/prisma/schema' && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.diff:from-empty: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel .work/prisma/schema --script && pnpm run workdir:clean
scripts.db:pull: pnpm run workdir:build && bash tooling/with-postgres-url.sh prisma db pull --schema .work/prisma/schema && pnpm run workdir:clean
